data.eml:eml: A new species of Hatchet-faced Treefrog Sphaenorhynchus Tschudi (Anura: Hylidae) from Quadrilátero Ferrífero, Minas Gerais, southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Araujo-Vieira, Katyuscia, Lacerda, João Victor A., Pezzuti, Tiago L., Leite, Felipe Sá Fortes, Assis, Clodoaldo Lopes De, Cruz, Carlos Alberto G. (2015): A new species of Hatchet-faced Treefrog Sphaenorhynchus Tschudi (Anura: Hylidae) from Quadrilátero Ferrífero, Minas Gerais, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4059 (1): 96-114, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4059.1.5
